meanings.definition: A plant trained to grow flat against a wall or trellis.
meanings.sent1: The espalier in the garden adds a touch of elegance to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully pruned the apple tree into an espalier along the fence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the espalier but couldn't find a way up.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like branches of an espalier, neatly arranged and reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the espalier covered in blossoms stayed in her mind.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of training a plant to grow flat against a wall or trellis.
meanings.sent1: Learning about espalier was fascinating for the students in the gardening class.
meanings.sent2: The book on gardening techniques explained the process of creating an espalier.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy gardener's attempt at espalier resembled a modern art installation.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to mastering espalier was as strong as the roots of the plants she trained.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on espalier techniques made the concept easy to understand.
